snippet: Applications for unemployment benefits for last week were lower than forecast and retailers like Costco and Target reported higher-than-expected sales in September.
abstract: Stocks rise after encouraging report on unemployment and better sales at retail stores.
lead_paragraph: Applications for unemployment benefits for last week were lower than forecast and retailers like Costco and Target reported higher-than-expected sales in September.

headline.seo: Retail Sales and Jobs Data Lift Shares
headline.main: Retail Sales and Jobs Data Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Retail Sales and Jobs Data Lift Shares
